author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Cosmo Pharmaceuticals And Pharmascience Establish License And Supply Agreement‍​
text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - COSMO PHARMACEUTICALS NV:‍​
* COSMO PHARMACEUTICALS AND PHARMASCIENCE ESTABLISH LICENSE AND SUPPLY AGREEMENT FOR ELEVIEW, METHYLENE BLUE MMX, RIFAMYCIN MMX AND QOLOTAG FOR CANADA​
* ‍AGREEMENT ENTAILS AN UP-FRONT PAYMENT TO COSMO OF TOTAL CA$ 5 MILLION​
* ‍ADDITIONAL COMMERCIAL MILESTONE PAYMENTS UPON REACHING CERTAIN ANNUAL SALES THRESHOLDS, AND HIGH DOUBLE-DIGIT ROYALTIES​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
